name: Multiverse Suicide
description:
Mr Blue is a very very bad guy, One day he suddenly feeled so bad about the things he had done the he decided to kill himself.

But, suicide is a hard thing in Mr Blue's world -- a multiverse

## Control

move: left/right arrow

jump: X  

throw knife: Z 

time travel: T 

restart level: R

toggle hint: H

## How to play

kill Mr Blue and all his time-clone to win, **time travel** creates a new time-clone, if you spawn too much clones, try restart level
